sentence.text: In clinical studies, Tilade has been co-administered with other anti-asthma medications, including inhaled and oral bronchodilators, and inhaled corticosteroids, with no evidence of increased frequency of adverse events or laboratory abnormalities.
sentence.negationtags: In clinical studies, Tilade has been co-administered with other anti-asthma medications, including inhaled and oral bronchodilators, and inhaled corticosteroids, <scope> <cue> with no </cue> evidence of increased frequency of adverse events or laboratory abnormalities. </scope>

sentence.text: No formal drug-drug interaction studies, however, have been conducted.
sentence.negationtags: <scope> <cue> No </cue> formal drug-drug interaction studies, </scope> however, have been conducted.
